sentences.sContent: an innovative approach to language teaching
innovative schemes for recycling waste materials
sentences.sCn: 废物回收利用的创新计划

sentences.sContent: ...mankind wouldn't be so innovative without curiosity...
...the article says innovative ideas alone do not ensure success...
...a real innovative company should develop an innovation culture and use it as a primary tool for success...

remMethod.val: 来自innovate(v. 改革； 创立)

words.tran: 革新的；富有革新精神的

trans.tranOther: an innovative idea or way of doing something is new, different, and better than those that existed before
